step_feedback.feedback: You maintained a good posture and seemed to engage your abdominal muscles effectively during inhalation.  Remember to visualize the fluid movement towards your chest.
Good job placing your hands on your abdomen. Focus on slow, controlled breathing; the visualization technique will help with the fluid movement.
While your inhalation was good, try to tighten your whole body muscles more during this step.  Remember to visualize the fluid moving to your chest.
The exhale needs more focus on relaxing your muscles completely.  Visualizing pushing the fluid out will help with this.

exercise_summary: You performed the deep breathing exercise well, showing good posture and inhalation technique.  Focus on fully tightening your muscles during inhalation and completely relaxing them during exhalation to improve lymphatic drainage. Remember to visualize the fluid movement.
